abstract: Insurgents attack a convoy of Afghan and international troops on Friday in Nangarhar Province, setting off a gun battle that left about 30 militants dead.
snippet: Insurgents attacked a convoy of Afghan and international troops on Friday in Nangarhar Province in eastern Afghanistan, setting off a gun battle that left about 30 militants dead, NATO said.
lead_paragraph: Insurgents attacked a convoy of Afghan and international troops on Friday in Nangarhar Province in eastern Afghanistan, setting off a gun battle that left about 30 militants dead, NATO said.
